sourcesContent: Login     import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } getLoginStatus(){ var loginCredentials = sessionStorage.getItem('loginCredentials'); return loginCredentials ? true : false; } mainPage(){ window.location.href = "/main-page"; } }
